## QGate Checklist
- [ ] OPS QGate report attached or linked
- [ ] Size audit run locally: `node tools/size_guard.mjs --all`
- [ ] No banned terms: `node tools/check_banned_terms.mjs`
- [ ] Any file changed >5% shrink reviewed & intentional
- [ ] Version headers updated (e.g., v3.x.y)
- [ ] GPT-loaded vs runtime-only files respected

- Risks / mitigations:
